Description:
SOLID START ON THE FRINGE OF EAST GEELONG
This neat home ideally located in Newcomb on an attractive north facing backyard allotment of 591m2 has endless possibilities.
Move straight in, with the potential to further enhance, extend, renovate your dream home project (STCA), this really is a once in a lifetime opportunity.
Comprising of three bedrooms or 2 with study, formal lounge and family room, kitchen/dining, neat and tidy central bathroom, separate laundry and ample storage. Features include polished hardwood floorboards, split system, gas heater and SLUG. To the rear of the property is a separate studio ideal for a home office.
This solid investment could potentially rent for $380. Close to the Geelong CBD, Waterfront, Schools and shopping this really is a perfect opportunity.
FEATURES:
Develop STCA
Split System AC
Gas Heating
591m2
Rent approx $380 pw
Drive through access

Description:
Peaceful Haven
Set on a north-facing block of 711sqm approx. amongst native gardens, this light and bright home is perfectly situated in a coveted part of Newcomb.
Offering a user-friendly layout with an open plan between the kitchen, meals and the living zone, there are three bedrooms, and the master has built-in robes. The home offers excellent scope for an extension ( STCA) into the large backyard. Outside there is a workshop or possible studio and a separate storage shed and water tank.
The home is close to primary and secondary schools, public transport, parks, and local shopping, with the Geelong CBD also only minutes away.
This property will appeal to the first home buyer or astute investor.
Text 25Glover to 0472 880 610 for full details.

Description:
Premier Location Without The Price Tag!
As rare as hens teeth and worth every cent purely on location alone this neat 2 bedroom brick veneer unit in the heart of traditional East Geelong is perfect for the first home buyer looking to enter the market, downsizer searching for a low maintenance home with space for a garden out the back or investor wanting a high yielding property that will continue to grow in value in the years to come!
Only a 2 minute walk to the Garden St. shops and 10 minutes from the C.B.D the unit features a bright and inviting living room that greets you upon entry, separate kitchen and dining area, built in robes and wall to wall carpet in both bedrooms and a functional bathroom with shower, toilet and space for further renovation. The standout feature of the property has to be the outdoor space that is on offer with an undercover entertainment area and low maintenance garden plus space for an outdoor setting in the naturally sun drenched yard. Theres direct internal access from the single lock up garage to the back yard and for those that dont drive public transport that will take you to all that Geelong and the Bellarine has to offer is close by. Added extras include private awnings, air conditioner, upright gas heater and plenty of bench of storage space in the kitchen.
Rarely does the chance to purchase in East Geelong become available at this price range and with so much on offer and as one of only 4 on the block this one wont last long. Set yourself up for the future and buy today. Dont delay as it will not last!
App. Rental $330 per week.
Insights: 4/346 Myers Street, East Geelong VIC 3219 was last sold in 2020.

Address: 20 Bronte Court St Albans Park VIC 3219
Description:
Downsize Without Compromise
Discover a hidden wonder, ready for the new owner to enjoy every feature of this quality-rich townhouse. Set well back from the street and with its own secure lock up garage, this is idyllic for a fashionable lifestyle or a solid investment. The two-bedroom design is single-level and surrounded by leafy private rear yard, perfect for relaxing outdoors. Low-maintenance and with a luxury edge, there's a generous living and dining zone featuring tiled floors. Quality is at the heart of the well-designed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, a sizeable pantry and a breakfast bar. Exacting design has created two spacious bedrooms, main with WIR and semi-ensuite and a genuine laundry, theres nothing to do but move in and appreciate everything about this prized residence. The sense of privacy extends outside to the decked undercover alfeco and sizeable yard, surrounded by established gardens, hedging.
The exclusive location is outstanding, located in a quiet court, close to public transport, schools, shops and within 10min drive to CBD.
A fantastic property and well worth a closer look! Hurry this one won't last!

Address: 27 Durran Street St Albans Park VIC 3219
Description:
Calling all first home buyers, growing families and Investors
This property could be the idyllic addition to your rental portfolio. Also for those wanting to get into the market this could be your perfect first home.
As you enter the light filled home you are greeted with a large formal lounge that flows onto the open plan kitchen/dining area.
With generous bench space, dishwasher and walk in pantry, the kitchen ties in perfectly with another separate living zone that leads out to the alfresco area with north facing established well cared for garden.
Comprising of three good sized bedrooms, all with built in robes and easy access to the family bathroom incorporating a bath, shower and separate toilet. To the rear of the home is a separate study and another bathroom with shower and toilet.
The home has been painted recently externally including roof and recapping.
Heating and cooling is accounted for with reverse cycle split system, gas heating and ceiling fans throughout ensuring comfort all year round.
The 5m x 8m garage with remote control door and extra shed to the rear with water tanks are another feature to this home. Further parking off street for 3 cars is also accommodated for.
Conveniently located only ten minutes to the Geelong CBD, minutes to local shops and public transport, this location is sure to appeal.
-3 Bedroom Family Home plus study
-2 separate living areas
- A/C Split System and Gas Heating
- 618m2
- Potential Rent $360 pw
- Close to Schools, Shops & Transport

Address: 81 Homestead Drive St Albans Park VIC 3219
Description:
Outstanding Family Home
Looking for a family home that has both house size and a backyard? Your search is over with this delightfully presented family home. Comprising 4 bedrooms, master with WIR and full ensuite, which has been recently updated, BIRs in the other 3BRs which are serviced by a separate central updated bathroom and 2 living areas. The undercover, decked alfresco area is your brilliant first impression with a well maintained backyard garden the idyllic backdrop to the Narellan salt/chlorine, solar heated in ground pool. Step inside the actual home and youll feel an immediate sense of welcome and warmth with quality floor coverings including quality carpet and newly installed timber flooring throughout. The clever floorplan allows for open yet dedicated living areas, which include the central family and meals zone, formal lounge with split system heating and cooling and separate study area adjacent. The modern quality kitchen features an island bench, glass splash backs, dishwasher, pendant lighting and an abundance of storage.
Other features include ducted gas heating and freshly painted throughout.
And for those buyers looking for that all important side access for trailer/boat/caravan, this is the one with a double remote panel lift garage with rear access, as well as room on the side leading through gates to the secure back yard. Perfect for tradies as well.
This spacious single level residence situated on a generous 725m2 approx. allotment is a well-appointed retreat in the ever popular St Albans Park that youll fall in love with. Dont miss your chance and enquire today.

Address: Lot 1/51 Grafton Street St Albans Park VIC 3219
Description:
Luscious Land Opportunity Ready to Build on Now
Calling all first home buyers, downsizers, savvy investors or first-time developers to this lucrative land prospect!
This is an excellent opportunity for those who dont want to go through the hassle of waiting for land to title, as this attractive parcel of land is ready to be built on (STCA) immediately. Situated in a prime pocket that is rapidly progressing now with only a limited amount of land prospects remaining.
Set over approximately 275m2 this block of land is surrounded by well-established homes and is well connected; being only 15 minutes drive to the Surf Coast in one direction and a short drive to Central Geelong in the other.
This growth corridor of Geelong is further serviced by local shopping centres, parks, childcare centres and bus stops. Then within easy walking distance are schools and recreational facilities that make for a truly convenient lifestyle.
Ready to build on, this site could be ideal for you to build your new home. Dont let this opportunity slip!
Roncon Real Estate - An Agency like other!

Description:
Hidden gem.
Fantastic opportunity to purchase this well sized 2 bedroom unit in the heart of Newcomb. Ideal for the first home buyer, investor or downsizer. You will be impressed with spacious room sizes, open plan kitchen, meals and living areas complete with split system heating and cooling for year round comfort. The large kitchen with electric wall oven and hotplates and plenty of cupboards and bench space looks over the meals and lounge areas with timber floors throughout. Complete with 2 very generous sized bedrooms (both with built in robes) and a large bathroom/laundry with separate W/C. A secluded rear court yard and a high fenced front yard gives the home a feeling of privacy and serenity. Located within walking distance to local shops and public transport and within minutes from Newcomb and Bellarine Shopping Centres, Eastern Gardens, Geelong Waterfront and CBD. This will be snapped up by the savvy investor or ideal for the local downsizer that wants to remain in the highly sort after area of Newcomb.

Description:
Current Bid: $440,000 - 3 Qualified Bidders
The Openn Negotiation has started. (Openn negotiation is an auction that is conducted online and allows flexible terms for qualified buyers). The property can sell at any time.
Contact Jim on 0408 305 615 or Ricky on 0438 307 579 immediately to become qualified and avoid disappointment.
On offer is a loving renovation on a solid brick home only 10 minutes from the Geelong CBD, Botanical Gardens and Waterfront. Set on a 585sqm approx. allotment in a quiet allotment is the perfect property for young families, first home buyers or the astute investor looking to add to their portfolio.

Description:
Exceptional Unit in Central Location
This beautiful unit will exceed your expectations at every turn. Offering spacious living, generous outdoor spaces and modern finishes, this property represents exceptional value and fantastic lifestyle. Comprising of 2 bedrooms, both with BIR, master with ensuite, central bathroom. This unit is more than meets the eye. With bedrooms situated at the front of the home, the central walkway leads you to a large open kitchen/dining/living room at the rear, a beautiful open space with ample windows and incoming light. The kitchen which includes stainless steel appliances, is well-equipped and situated overlooking the dining and living space. Large sliding glass doors flawlessly connect the living to the outdoors, a great space for entertaining. Every need has been catered for in this property, including ducted heating, split system cooling and single remote garage with direct entry providing both convenience and security. Situated only minutes from South Geelong Station, local shopping centres and sporting facilities, this location offers a quiet area within close proximity to amenities. If youre looking for low-maintenance, secure living without compromising on space, this is the unit for you.

Description:
Unique opportunity to create your own haven in the Barrabool Hills.
Stunning undulating countryside provides spectacular views youll never tire of at this rare slice of the highly sought Barrabool Hills.
First time offered, the 2013sqm property was originally part of the Strathlachlan Estate and held by the one family since 1851. It presents a unique opportunity to create a tranquil, private haven with a manageable land size just 10 minutes from Highton Village and the Princes Highway Ring Road.
The builders own home was built to last in 1967 and displays plenty of mid-century charm to update, renovate or redevelop, and add your own modern stamp to the original brick dwelling that includes features such as a timber panelled entry and painted brick feature wall in the lounge room. There are timber floors waiting to be uncovered beneath the carpet and ample space to renovate the central kitchen with a new electric wall oven and cooktop, walk-in pantry and large servery window onto the living room. Deep windows and sliding doors link the lounge and two front bedrooms to a terrace and frame lovely views of the surrounding hills, with no neighbours in sight.
The vista over Mt Moriac is a highlight of the kitchen and dining area at the rear. All three bedrooms in the main house have large built-in wardrobes and share an updated bathroom and separate toilet. A second self-contained dwelling provides a fourth bedroom and study or potential fifth bedroom. With its own entry, kitchen and bathroom, it would be ideal for a teenager, ageing parent or even Airbnb. Outside a double garage with through access and separate single garage and large workshop are perfect for those who like to tinker.
The property is nine minutes from Moriac, 20 minutes from the Geelong CBD and surf coast beaches, 30 minutes from the Avalon Airport and 70 minutes from Melbourne. Commuters can travel from the front gate to the West Gate Bridge without encountering a traffic light.
Insights: 222 Andersons Road, Barrabool VIC 3221 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
A Walk in the Park.
Not too often does an opportunity come up the the Golden Triangle of East Geelong, on a formidable corner block, with a period home on it. This Californian Bungalow is situated 100mts from the Eastern Park and Botanical Gardens and a short stroll to the Geelong Waterfront.
Displaying a formidable floorplan, three bedrooms with built in robes downstairs, a huge open plan rumpus/living/or a large bedroom upstairs, spacious timber kitchen, updated bathroom, North facing rear yard, with established gardens, single car garage and workshop.
The home provides comfortable living in Blue Chip East Geelong, with scope to further enhance and improve. An inspection is a must to take in the potential of what this large family home can provide.

Description:
Magnificent First Home Buyers Opportunity
This wonderful 3 bedroom family home in an established neighbourhood is ready to create memories in. Close to schools, parklands and employment opportunities, it's wonderfully situated in a safe, quiet area of the City of Greater Geelong so offers all the additional amenities of a regional city on the move.
• Spacious, bright, open plan kitchen/meals/lounge area for fun family time.
• Kitchen with island bench, dual sinks, loads of storage space, stainless steel dishwasher and gas cooktop.
• North facing, undercover entertaining area for barbeques and relaxation.
• Modern heating/cooling system.
• Master bedroom with opulent en-suite.
• Lockable twin car garage.
• Main bathroom with relaxing bathtub, large shower and vanity.
• Stormwater tank for garden usage.
• Large, naturally lit bedrooms with built-in robes.
With the peaceful Barwon River a short walk away and all the entertainment and fun of the Great Ocean Road and Bellarine Peninsula on your doorstep, this beautifully presented family home is perfect for first home buyers or a young couple.
This rare opportunity will be snapped up soon so don't delay. Call Redstar Real Estate now to organise an inspection.

Description:
Top Location, Room To Move and Abundant Potential
The attractive façade of this home on the Thomson/East Geelong border is just the beginning of whats on offer. Situated on an enormous block of approximately 975m2 and featuring up to five bedrooms, its appeal to homeowners, investors or developers is unmatched.
A recent update has retained many of its period features whilst providing modern bathrooms, new carpet and fresh paint throughout. Only upon inspection can one appreciate the space that this property provides.
Up to 5 bedrooms, some with built in robes and ceiling fans. The master bedroom
includes an updated ensuite, study nook and separate access to the undercover al
fresco area.
A huge open-plan kitchen, dining and lounge space serviced with air-conditioning,
ceiling fan and double-door access to the outdoor entertaining area.
Gas central heating throughout.
Renovated central bathroom with bath.
Undercover BBQ and entertaining area with ceiling fans.
Outdoor workshop/shed, large garden shed and undercover car parking. Also, off-
street parking for a further 4 or more vehicles, caravan, boat or trailer.
Clear driveway access and a large, rear yard suitable for development or sub-division
(STCA).
Literally a minutes walk to St. Margaret's Primary School and with easy access to childcare, local cafés and the bustling Garden Street shopping precinct, this opportunity to purchase a large home on substantial land so close to town is a rare one.
Call Wilsons today to arrange your private inspection.

175m²

Description:
New home - UNDER CONTRACT
The central location on offer in Thomson demands attention with schools, shopping centres, sporting reserves, the CBD, Eastern Gardens, Barwon River, waterfront, Geelong show grounds, the Bellarine rail trail and train station all within just minutes.
Positioned in a quiet, low traffic street in an established neighbourhood, this property offers peace, privacy and very low maintenance for the downsizer, first home buyer or wise investor.
First home buyers are eligible for the FHOG and stamp duty savings!
Tiled throughout the main traffic areas and with high ceilings, the spacious open plan design offers plenty of natural light and comprises 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, open kitchen / dining, carpeted living, separate laundry and more.
The kitchen includes dishwasher, gas cooking, stone tops and pantry, whilst gas ducted heating and RC/AC control the climate year round.
Opening out from the main living, the timber decked entertainment area is edged with basic landscapes that keep the maintenance to a minimum.
The double remote panel lift garage with internal access completes this great offering.
Call Dion on 0424 940 629 to learn more and book an appointment today.

Description:
Spotless Presentation In A Fantastic Location!
Buying your first home, investing with an eye to the future or downsizing to simplify your life; whatever your motivation this is the one that will get you off the couch and into the property market!
Set on an impressive allotment of approximately 540 square metres this neat home is comprised of 2 spacious bedrooms, both with built in robes and wall to wall carpet and master with ceiling fan, fantastic open plan living, dining and kitchen area that greets you upon entry and as an added bonus a multipurpose sunroom at the rear of the home that doubles as a second living area or 3rd bedroom and leads out to the private rear yard.
Standout features include polished boards in the kitchen and dining area, fully appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, gas cook top, electric oven and range hood plus ceiling fan, gas heater and reverse cycle heating and cooling unit in the living room.
Theres ample car accommodation available with a single carport leading through to a double garage with internal access to the home and for those that dont drive theres public transport metres from the front door and Bellarine and Newcomb Central shopping villages are both within walking distance as is the East Geelong TAFE campus and multiple sporting facilities. All of this with the Geelong CBD and all that the Bellarine has to offer at your disposal!
Make the time to inspect and buy with an eye to the future.

Description:
Super Starter of Investment
Attention all first home buyers or investors, this updated home situated on a large block of approximately 647m2 in a quiet court location is a must to inspect. Comprising of 3 bedrooms, spacious lounge and with a renovated kitchen and bathroom, this home is ready to move straight in. There is ducted heating, split system AC, an outdoor entertaining area, well located and walking distance to good schools and quality shopping centres.

Description:
Calling All First Home Buyers and Investors.
With easy access to the CBD, local shops, schools and public transport this location is sure to appeal. Perfect for those wanting to enter the real estate market or an addition to your rental portfolio do not miss this opportunity. Set on 779m2 with the potential to further enhance, extend, renovate, or develop (STCA) this really is a fantastic opportunity.
Three bedrooms, two with BIRs are complimented by a neat bathroom with shower, bath and separate toilet.
The lounge room with plenty of natural light flows through to the kitchen/dining area. The kitchen with upright stove/gas cooktop plenty of bench space and oversized pantry is very practical.
Heating and cooling is accounted for with a split system, Arrow wood heater, gas upright heater and ceiling fan in the master bedroom
Comprising of oversized SLUG, double carport with further off street parking for 3 cars.
Minutes from local schools, Newcomb Shopping Centre, Splashdown Aquatic Centre and Geelong CBD. This is an easy investment or ideal property to enter Geelong's growing market.
779m2
Split System
5 min to CBD
Develop STCA
Rent approx $330pw
North Aspect Backyard
